string.text:
An empty case stripped of any useful items, though the capacity and size are sufficient when reused as storage.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable As Stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An empty gun case void of any weaponry. It provides more space than conventional backpacks at the cost of weight.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable As Stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A spacious metal box dedicated for storing items. It provides the most space compared to alternatives, but its heavy weight make it harder to transport.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable As Stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

Small cloth sheets sewn together to form a simple sack. Useful for creating a small stash in a pinch.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable As Stash
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
